title: Bernie Sanders Saunders Schant "Only English" in Dolores Huerta, Nevada?
subtitle: The activist Dolores Huerta sent a tweet alleging that Bernie Sanders' supporters yelled at her "only in English," but the witnesses gave conflicting accounts.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The supporters of Bernie Sanders shouted "in English only" at Civil Rights activist Dolores Huerta during the Nevada event, and apparently objected to the translation of notes into Spanish.
